name: IN TRUCK DRIVING
description:
Get set to enjoy the truck simulator and experience real truck driving on the highway

This truck simulator is set in an open-world realistic 3D environment in which you have to cruise through city traffic and as well as on endless stretches of comfortless highways. The addition of different types of trucks improves the experience. Unlock these trucks by advancing to the next modes.

Key Features

  • Four different modes
  • Many levels to play
